הוֹד־ <S%H1935><s%> hod- Honour וְהָדָ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> ve-ha-Dar and majesty לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav; [are] before עֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> 'oz him strength וְ֝תִפְאֶ֗רֶת <S%H8597><s%> ve-tif-'E-ret, and beauty בְּמִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H4720><s%> be-mik-da-Sho. [are] in his sanctuary

אִמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> 'im-Ru Say בַגּוֹיִ֨ם׀ <S%H1471><s%> vag-go-Yim among the heathen יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [that] the LORD מָלָ֗ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach, reigneth אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- Indeed תִּכּ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> tik-Kon also shall be established תֵּ֭בֵל <S%H8398><s%> Te-vel the world בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> tim-Mot; that it shall not be moved יָדִ֥ין <S%H1777><s%> ya-Din he shall judge עַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim, the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> be-mei-sha-Rim. righteously

יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <S%H8055><s%> yis-me-Chu rejoice הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> Hash-sha-ma-yim Let the heavens וְתָגֵ֣ל <S%H1523><s%> ve-ta-Gel be glad הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; and let the earth יִֽרְעַ֥ם <S%H7481><s%> yir-'Am roar הַ֝יָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, let the sea וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃ <S%H4393><s%> u-me-lo-'O. and the fulness

יַעֲלֹ֣ז <S%H5937><s%> ya-'a-Loz be joyful שָׂ֭דַי <S%H7704><s%> dai Let the field וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after בּ֑וֹ bo; אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-ne-Nu, rejoice כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> 'a-tzei- and all that [is] therein then shall all the trees יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> Ya-'ar. of the wood

לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei Before יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כִּ֬י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָ֗א <S%H935><s%> Va, for he cometh כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָא֮ <S%H935><s%> va for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <S%H8199><s%> lish-Pot to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <S%H8199><s%> yish-pot- he shall judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> be-Tze-dek; with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mim, and the people בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H530><s%> be-'e-mu-na-To. with his truth
